metadata.title: CVE-2018-10529 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in LibRaw 0.18.9. There is an out-of-bounds readaffecting the X3F property table list implementation in libraw_x3f.cpp andlibraw_cxx.cpp.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
